mewayin siwil purawasiyanta labena ayithiwasikam kriyathmaka kala yuthuyi….ese kriyathmaka kara, polisiya pramukha widhayakaye kriyakarithwaya dadi lesa palanayata lak kala yuthuyi….sadharana udghoshana thathwayanta muhuna denne keseda, eewa apalitha thathwayanta path wanna nodi niwaradi lesa wisuruwa harinne kohomada kiyana eka gana nisi puhunuwak laba diya yuthuyi….sampradayika chinthanaya hewath “api ralahamila….api inne olu palanna….api inne goranadu karanna….api inne sara karanna…api inne gahanna, wedi thiyanna” kiyana sombi manasikathwayen owun bahara kara, widhimath, garu saru athi wruththikayan pirisak kala yuthuyi…marumus chandi kama, us adi mechcharayi papuwa adi mechcharayi, iskoledi ragar gahala, krikat gahala, futbol gahala thibima ( kotinma kiwwoth sellamata pora kala thibima ) witharak sudusukama nokota, adhyapanika sudusu kam dadiwa baliya yuthuyi….sama polis saha hamuda niladhariyekutama sammatha jathika saha jathyanthara nithi pilibandawa pramanawath adhyapanayak laba diya yuthuyi…..

ema kalaya thula masakata rupiyal dasa dahasaka dimanawak labadena bawa da amathiwaraya kiyayi.guru sewayata bandawaganna kisiwakuta masa thunaka puhunuwakin thorawa sthira pathwim laba nodimata rajaya thiranaya kara athi bawa da amathiwaraya kiyayi.gunawardhana mahatha me adahas palakale adhyapana amathyanshaye eeye pawathi madhya hamuwakadiya.me athara adhyapana widyapita diplomadharin dedahas pansiyakata wadi pirisakata labana marthu masaye di guru pathwim laba dena bawa gunawardhana mahatha kiwe ya.mita pera awuruduwalata wada kalin widya pita wibhaga prathipala labagena mewara kal athiwama guruwarun path karanne yayi da me wana witath prathipala labagena thibenne yayi da amathiwaraya kiya.me guruwarunta thaman padinchi pradeshawalata aasannaye pathwim laba dimata uthsaha karana bawath pawasu amathiwaraya eheth labadena pathwim deshapalana ho wenath balapam nisa wenas nokarana bawath awadharanaya kele ya..
